name: Next.js Migration
description: Migrating the company website from React CRA to Next.js for SSR and performance improvements.

name: Mobile App Redesign
description: Redesigning the UX of the mobile app with a modern look and improved accessibility.

name: AI Chatbot Integration
description: Integrate an AI chatbot for automated support using OpenAI API.

name: Analytics Dashboard
description: Building a team performance dashboard using Recharts and Next.js API routes.

name: Authentication System
description: Implementing secure login/signup using JWT, bcrypt, and Prisma ORM.

name: Cloud Deployment
description: Deploy all microservices to AWS using CI/CD pipelines.
